description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Crab Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Crab Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the pasta onto serving plates and sprinkle with the crabmeat. Serve with lime wedges.
